SamplePrimaryAntibody: polyclonal rabbit anti-serotonin antibody, (Ref. PC228L, batch D21789-1; Calbiochem, La Jolla, CA, USA)
SampleSecondaryAntibody: Alexa fluor 594 goat anti-rabbit antibody, (Invitrogen, Cergy Pontoise, France) to label serotonin, and streptavidin conjugated to Alexa fluor 488, (Invitrogen) to label neurobiotin
